meanings.definition: The action of impinging or the state of being impinged.
meanings.sent1: The impingement of the ball against the wall was loud.
meanings.sent2: The impingement of the car against the barrier caused a dent.
meanings.sent3: The impingement of the cat on the dog's tail made them both jump.
meanings.sent4: The impingement of the storm on the coast left a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The impingement of the hammer on the nail was swift and precise.

meanings.definition: The physical contact or collision of one thing with another.
meanings.sent1: The impingement of the branches in the wind created a rustling sound.
meanings.sent2: The impingement of the soccer player with the opponent led to a foul.
meanings.sent3: The impingement of the spoon on the bowl made a clinking noise.
meanings.sent4: The impingement of ideas in the meeting sparked a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The impingement of the waves on the shore was calming to watch.
